metadata.name: USE|LESS 1
metadata.description:
Spend enough time in any web3 community where NFTs are discussed, and you inevitably will encounter someone asking some version of "What's the utility?" You may even note an overwrought community manager or mod responding with a terse disclaimer along the lines of "There is no utility." That is to say, the token in question is purportedly useless.

But what both the question and the answer ignore is the fact that tokens by their very nature are signs, symbols, emblems onto which anyone, anywhere can project whatever meaning or utility they wish. They don't need to be the creator of the token. They don't need to be an owner of the token. They don't need to ask for anyone's approval.

With this $USELESS token, I challenge you to render the message a lie in the most creative way you can imagine.

Give it meaning. Give it purpose. Make it useful.

If you do, I'd love to hear all about it. Send me an email at useless.snowstorms@simplelogin.com. Or even better, publicly tag me on Twitter, Lenster, Farcaster, or wherever else you can find me so we can share what you've done with others.

LOGONAUT.ETH
https://link3.to/logonaut
